COVID.fact: For school age children: 0-17, the case-fatality rate is 89 in 1 million. Which is statistically 0%.
CDC: Less than 1 in 10,000 chance of contracting COVID from surfaces.
CDC: 6% of COVID deaths were caused by COVID alone. 94% had preexisting conditions (comorbidities).
Nearly one third of U.S. COVID deaths are linked to nursing homes, but they stopped reporting these numbers after June 1, 2021.
Over 400 studies find nonpharmaceutical interventions such as mask mandates, lockdowns, and school closures have had no discernible impact of virus trajectories.
The statistic that 97% of COVID hospitalizations are unvaccinated comes from January-June, 2021. During this period, the vast majority of Americans were not vaccinated.

fact: The cycle threshold (the number of cycles needed to detect a virus in a PCR test)--usually set at around 40--is far too high and can result in many false positives.

In New York's state lab, the Wadsworth Center, if the CT had been set to 35 from 40, 43% of positive tests would have shown up negative. If it were more sensitive, a CT of 30, then 63% would have been false positives.
A CT too high can detect dead RNA which had been left over from previous infection, like finding a hair in a room long after the person had left.

COVID.fact: The CDC is revoking their Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) for their PCR tests and are now recommending laboratories to use tests that "can facilitate detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2 and influenza viruses."
The FDA is alerting clinical laboratory staff that false positive results can occur with the Roche Molecular Systems, Inc. (Roche) cobas SARS-CoV-2 & Influenza A/B Nucleic Acid Test.

Vaccine Safety.fact: On table 4 of this study, the data shows that out of the 827 women, 700 of them received their first vaccine in their third trimester of pregnancy. This means 127 women received a vaccine during their first or second trimesters.Out of the 127 women receiving vaccines during their first or second trimesters, 104 spontaneous abortions occurred before their pregnancies hit the 20-week mark. That is an 82% rate of spontaneous abortions in first and second trimester pregnant women.

fact: The American Heart Association looked at cases of myocarditis in young people with an average age of 15.8 years old, and found that cases of myocarditis occurred in 136 patients (97.8%) following mRNA COVID vaccine.
131 (94.2%) following the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine; 128 (91.4%) occurred after the 2nd dose. Symptoms started a median of 2 days (range 0-22) after vaccination.

Vaccine alternatives.fact: According the the NIH, ivermectin is an approved drug for treating COVID.

Meta analysis of use of ivermectin for treating and preventing COVID has found large, statistically significant reductions in mortality, time to clinical recovery, and time to viral clearance. Furthermore, trials report significantly reduced risks of contracting COVID-19 with the regular use of ivermectin.
Large reductions in COVID-19 deaths are possible using ivermectin. Using ivermectin early in the clinical course may reduce numbers progressing to severe disease.

fact: Rolling Stone released a story of a doctor claiming her hospital had delays in treating other patients because they were busy taking care of ivermectin overdoses.
